name: Incorrect Provision of Specified Functionality
description: The code does not function according to its published specifications, potentially leading to incorrect usage.

x_mitre_observed_examples.description: Error checking routine in PKCS#11 library returns "OK" status even when invalid signature is detected, allowing spoofed messages.
Chain: System call returns wrong value (CWE-393), leading to a resultant NULL dereference (CWE-476).
Program uses large timeouts on unconfirmed connections resulting from inconsistency in linked lists implementations.
UI inconsistency; visited URLs list not cleared when "Clear History" option is selected.

x_mitre_potential_mitigations.description: Ensure that your code strictly conforms to specifications.
